pdhp97:2: na tamhi chanda<unclear>ṁ</unclear> kayirātha dukkho pāpassa sa<unclear>ṁ</unclear>ayo ।।
pdhp98:1: kayira ce puruṣo pu<unclear>ṁ</unclear>ña<unclear>ṁ</unclear> kay<unclear>i</unclear>ra cena<unclear>ṁ</unclear> punappuno ।
pdhp98:2: tamh<unclear>i</unclear> eva chanda<unclear>ṁ</unclear> kayirātha sukho puṁñassa saṁcayo ।।
pdhp100:1: akataṁ dukkataṁ śreyo pacchā tapati dukkataṁ ।
pdhp100:2: dukkataṁ me kataṁ ti śocati bhūyo śocati doggatiṁ gato ।।
pdhp101:1: katañ ca sukataṁ sādhu yaṁ kattā nānutappati ।
pdhp101:2: sukataṁ me kataṁ ti nandati bhūyo nandati soggatiṅ gato ।।
pdhp102:1: pāpo pi paśśate bhadraṁ yāva pāpaṁ na paccati ।
pdhp102:2: yadā tu paccate pāpaṁ atha pāpo pāpāni paśśati ।।
pdhp103:1: bhadro pi paśśate pāpaṁ yāva bhadraṁ na paccati ।
pdhp103:2: yadā tu paccate bhadraṁ atha bhadro bhadrāṇi paśśati ।।
pdhp104:1: pāpaṁ pi karato bhadraṁ yāva pāpaṁ na paccati ।
pdhp104:2: atha payirāgate kāle pāpo pāpāni paśśati ।।
pdhp105:1: bhadraṁ pi karato pāpaṁ yāva bhadraṁ na paccati ।
pdhp105:2: atha payirāgate kāle bhadro bhadrāṇi paśśati ।।
pdhp106:1: pāṇimhi ce vraṇo nā ’ssa dhāreyā pāṇinā viṣaṁ ।
pdhp106:2: nāvraṇe viṣam anneti nāsti pāpaṁ akurvvato ।।
pdhp107:1: na hi pāpakaṁ kataṁ kammaṁ sajjaṁ chīraṁ va mucchati ।
pdhp107:2: dahantaṁ bālam anneti bhassachanno va pāpako ।।
pdhp108:1: na hi pāpakaṁ kataṁ kammaṁ sajjaṁ śastam va kantati ।
pdhp108:2: maraṇo ’peto hi jānāti yā gatī pāpakaṁmuṇo ।।
pdhp109:1: anāgataṁ paṭikayirātha kiccaṁ mā vo kiccaṁ kiccakāle vyadheyā ।
pdhp109:2: taṁ tārisaṁ paṭikatakiccakāriṁ na naṁ kiccaṁ kiccakāle vyadheti ।।
pdhp110:1: paṭikacceva taṁ kayirā yaṁ ñāyyā hitam āttano ।
pdhp110:2: na śākaṭikamanti ssa mantaṁ dhīro parākrame ।।
pdhp111:1: yathā śākaṭiko māggaṁ samaṁ hettā mahāpathaṁ ।
pdhp111:2: viṣamaṁ māggam āsājja akkhachinno tha jhāyati ।।
pdhp112:2: bālo maccumukhaṁ prātto akkhachinno va jhāyati ।।
pdhp113:2: pāpā pāpehi kaṁmehi nirayaṁ te upapajjatha ।।
pdhp114:1: abhūtavādī nirayaṁ upeti yo cāpi kattā na karomī ti āha ।
pdhp114:2: ubho pi te precca samā bhavanti nihīnakaṁmā manujā paratra ।।
pdhp115:1: yo apraduṣṭassa naro praduṣyati śuddhassa poṣassa anaṁgaṇassa ।
pdhp115:2: tam eva bālaṁ pracceti pāpaṁ sukhumo rajo paṭivātaṁ va khitto ।।
pdhp116:1: vāṇijo va bhayaṁ māggaṁ appasāttho mahaddhano ।
pdhp118:1: kuṇapassa pi gandhucchijjati u ’ddhukitassa pi rāti accayā ।
pdhp118:2: puruṣassa adhammacāriṇo annāhaṁ gandho na chijjati ।।
pdhp119:1: yatha ggrahapatayo prabhūtaratanā āḍitte nagaramhi dahyamāne ।
pdhp120:1: tatha-r-iva śamaṇā prabhūtapraṁñā ayirā ayirapathesu sicchamānā ।
pdhp120:2: jātijarāmaraṇabhayāddittā dukkhāṭṭā vyāyamanti api prāpuṇema śāntiṁ ।।
